About Me

I am a novice web developer. I am currently enrolled in Michigan State University's Coding Bootcamp. I've always had an interest in computers and technology in general. Coding and Web Development is a fun opportunity for me to be creative. I'm always proud to show the websites I create. I am currently located in Battle Creek, MI.
